Meet Taylor:

I'm an experienced web writer who has worked with a variety of clients including Perez Hilton, the Canadian Breast Cancer Foundation, Toronto Fashion Week, The Onion and QuestChat. When I'm not working on fun projects I'm usually eating my way through Toronto's food scene, adding photos to my Tumblr, or drinking red wine with friends. Ya know, the usual.
